name: bejesus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an expression of surprise or emphasis: Well bejesus, that's interesting. Bejaysus, I hope not.
More examplesFewer examplesAh, bejesus, it is.He often says "Bejaysus!", perhaps because his parents are Irish. "Bejaysus," muttered his father.
